name: fullstack-take-home
description: full stack course selector with node, express, sequelize, posgres, and react

scripts.seed: cd server && npm run seed && cd ../
scripts.server: cd server && yarn && yarn start && cd ../
scripts.client: cd course-client && yarn && yarn start && cd ../
scripts.build:client: cd course-client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.startApp: npm run seed && npm run server & npm run client
